sentence: yo pana bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya, kiṃ pan'imehi khudd'ānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāva'd'eva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṃvattantī'ti, sikkhāpadavivaṇṇake pācittiyaṃ.
